title: Episode 19: What Jealousy Is Teaching Us
description:
In this episode, we talk about two things that seem very different: gratitude and jealousy. But what if jealousy could teach us how to be grateful? In this episode, you’ll learn how to be more self aware, how to understand why jealousy happens, + how to switch up the way you think about jealousy you become happier + fulfilled.
